reviews.text: Use Bromsgrove glass quite a few times now for cutting glass, they have always managed to get it done the same day👍 I also needed a mirror had one of their sock ones it was cheaper than Amazon. The staff are friendly and helpful

reviews.author: Warren uk
reviews.text: Wish I could give a no star review. Had the misfortune of  visiting  them today. Left empty handed. Never again.

reviews.author: Caroline Jane Guy
reviews.text: The staff are very helpful and have a friendly professional manner, good service.

_found_via: emergency glazier window repair in Bromsgrove
